unauthenticated.or-login-text: You have an account already? <link>Login</link> instead
unauthenticated.or-sign-up-text: You don't have an account? <link>Sign up</link> instead

email-input.label: Email
email-input.error-text: That doesn't look like an email

phone-input.label: Phone
phone-input.error-text: That doesn't look like a valid phone number

password-input.label: Password
password-input.error-text: The password must have at least 12 characters, 1 number, 1 special character, 1 uppercase letter and 1 lowercase letter

unauthenticated.terms-and-conditions-text: I read the <Link>terms and conditions policy</Link> and I agree with it

exceptions.UsernameExistsException: There is already an account with that email
exceptions.AutoSignInException: There was an error during auto sign in
exceptions.UnknownException: Unknown error please talk to support and give them the following error code: {exception}
exceptions.SessionWithoutPreviousSignIn: Can't get a session for the user, fetchAuthSession() was called without previously calling signIn() or autoSignIn()
exceptions.MissingIdToken: The idToken that was supposed to be found inside the tokens props of the fetchAuthSession() response is undefined, this is an error from AWS Cognito or the Amplify SDK
exceptions.ExpiredCodeException: The confirmation code has expired, please refresh the page and try to sign up again
exceptions.CodeDeliveryFailureException: AWS SES was unable to deliver the code to the specified email, one possible reason may be because the specified email is not verified and the AWS SES service is running on sandbox mode, not production mode

alert.confirm-account-text: Confirm your account: Click the link we send to {email}

premium-products-section.heading: Premium products
premium-products-section.description: We offer the best quality on every single item we sell

unique-products-section.heading: Unique products
unique-products-section.description: All of our products are unique, you can't find them anywhere else

multiple-payment-options-section.heading: Multiple payment options
multiple-payment-options-section.description: We accept multiple payment options so you are free to pay as you want

faq-page.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq-page.description: Here are the questions most frequently asked about Ramzeis Store.

bottom-section.heading: Still need help? Contact us!
bottom-section.description: To contact us, send us an email at dankramirez@outlook.com or contact us on our social media.

change-my-password-section.description-text: Your new password must meet the following criteria:

exceptions.UnknownException: Unknown error please talk to support and give them the following error code: {exception}

danger-zone-section.description-text: Once you delete your account you won't be able to get it back, everything will be completely lost. If you really want to proceed please write I want to delete my account on the text input and click on the confirm deletion button.
danger-zone-section.input-placeholder: I want to delete my account

exceptions.UnknownException: Unknown error while trying to delete your account, please talk to support and give them the following error code: {exception}
exceptions.InvalidTextException: The provided text does not match "I want to delete my account"
